name: Infocom EasyFlash Collection V4.1
overview: An exciting release for the C64, including 3 games only previously released for the C128! Including: • A Mind Forever Voyaging (1985) • Trinity (1986) • Bureaucracy (1987) • Nord and Bert Couldn't Make Head or Tail of it With the addition of Nord and Bert Couldn't Make Head or Tail of it, a release that usually requires quite a bit of disk swapping, all released in convenient and very fast loading cartridge format. Enjoy some of Infocom's most interesting work in one collector's release.
